== Larry Laffer's wiki ==
Welcome to my Wiki.

=== Introduction ===
Here is my contribution for Ubuntu. I spend some of my free time testing Ubuntu 6.06 to report bugs for what is not working as I expect or as it shoulds. I can't wait to see the final version as the Alpha version already impress me.

Follow this page to see some of things I done for Ubuntu. Lot of stuff I do is not part of this Wiki, but I'll try to update this page everytime I can to reflect my help to the community.
